Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at BlueBay Banús in Marbella (Puerto Banus), you'll be convenient to Centro Plaza and Puerto Banus Marina. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of El Corte Ingles Shopping Center and Real Club de Golf Las Brisas.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 315 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge). Additional features include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of BlueBay Banús. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a beach bar, or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of BlueBay Banús. Thirsty? Quench your thirst at a bar/lounge, a beach bar, or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at BlueBay Banús in Marbella (Puerto Banus), you'll be convenient to Centro Plaza and Puerto Banus Marina. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of El Corte Ingles Shopping Center and Real Club de Golf Las Brisas.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Centro Plaza - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Puerto Banus Marina - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
El Corte Ingles Shopping Center - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Real Club de Golf Las Brisas - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Real Club de Golf Guadalmina - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
La Quinta Golf - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
La Dama de Noche Golf Course - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Atalaya Golf and Country Club - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
El Paraiso Golf Club - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Saladillo Beach - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Fontanilla Beach - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Flamingos Golf Club - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Marbella Marina - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Venus Beach - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Orange Square - 8 km / 5 mi

The preferred airport for BlueBay Banús is Malaga (AGP) - 47.6 km / 29.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Rincon Andaluz is Malaga (AGP) - 47.6 km / 29.6 mi.
